title: [Twin Canyons, Western Canyon]
description: Making a slight bend here, the canyon winds its way around the rock outcrop.  Deep shadows permeate the canyon as it narrows, making the darkness of night seem almost an ink black void.  Chattering noises can be distinctly heard from a large crack in the rockface to the east while water slowly drips from icicles that hang from smaller cracks in the southern canyon wall.

Making a slight bend here, the canyon winds its way around the rock outcrop.  Deep shadows hug the southern wall as the canyon narrows, forcing the sunlight to diffuse higher on the walls.  Chattering noises can be distinctly heard from a large crack in the rockface to the east, while water slowly drips from smaller cracks in the southern canyon wall.
